author: Nolan D. McCaskill
title: Governors see possible 'flattening' of the curve in latest coronavirus data
description: Improvements in New York, New Jersey, California and Washington raise hopes, but "this isn’t over," one governor warns.
content:
Those are all good signs and, again, would suggest a possible flattening of the curve" that tracks the number of cases, he said.
Next door, New Jersey now has the second-worst outbreak of the virus. More than 41,000 people in New Jersey have tested positive,… [+2231 chars]
